mapper.insert: insert into tb_warehouse_goods (id, warehouseId, goodsCode, goodsStock, deleted, saleNum, vipPrice, discountsPrice, specialSalePrice, wholesalePrice, price, createTime, updateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodscode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsstock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountsprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specialsaleprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wholesaleprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, warehouseId, goodsCode, goodsStock, deleted, saleNum, vipPrice, discountsPrice, specialSalePrice, wholesalePrice, price, createTime, updateTime from tb_warehouse_goods where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
